verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> which are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and are <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but not in <S%H571>truth,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

For they <S%H7121>call<s%> themselves of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5564>stay<s%> themselves on the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> things from the <S%H227>beginning;<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and I <S%H8085>showed<s%> them; I <S%H6213>did<s%> them <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to pass.
Because I <S%H1847>knew<s%> that you are <S%H7186>obstinate,<s%> and your <S%H6203>neck<s%> is an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1517>sinew,<s%> and your <S%H4696>brow<s%> <S%H5154>brass;<s%>

I have even from the <S%H227>beginning<s%> <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to you; <S%H2962>before<s%> it <S%H935>came<s%> to pass I <S%H8085>showed<s%> it you: <S%H6435>lest<s%> you should <S%H559>say,<s%> My <S%H6090>idol<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> them, and my <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and my <S%H5262>molten<s%> image, has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them.

You have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> this; and will not you <S%H5046>declare<s%> it? I have <S%H8085>showed<s%> you <S%H2319>new<s%> things from this <S%H6258>time,<s%> even <S%H5341>hidden<s%> things, and you did not <S%H3045>know<s%> them.

They are <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> and not from the <S%H227>beginning;<s%> even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> them not; <S%H6435>lest<s%> you should <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> them.

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> not; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> you <S%H3045>knew<s%> not; <S%H1571>yes,<s%> from that <S%H227>time<s%> that your <S%H241>ear<s%> was not <S%H6605>opened:<s%> for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that you would deal <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and were <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H6586>transgressor<s%> from the <S%H990>womb.<s%>
For my <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake<s%> will I <S%H748>defer<s%> my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and for my <S%H8416>praise<s%> will I <S%H2413>refrain<s%> for you, that I <S%H3772>cut<s%> you not off.
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H6884>refined<s%> you, but not with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you in the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>

For my own <S%H4616>sake,<s%> even for my own <S%H4616>sake,<s%> will I <S%H6213>do<s%> it: for <S%H349>how<s%> should my name be <S%H2490>polluted?<s%> and I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H312>another.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to me, O <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> my <S%H7121>called;<s%> I am he; I am the <S%H7223>first,<s%> I <S%H637>also<s%> am the <S%H314>last.<s%>

My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> has laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and my <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H2946>spanned<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> to them, they <S%H5975>stand<s%> up <S%H3162>together.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> you, <S%H6908>assemble<s%> yourselves, and <S%H8085>hear;<s%> <S%H4310>which<s%> among them has <S%H5046>declared<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things? The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H157>loved<s%> him: he will <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>
I, even I, have <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> him: I have <S%H935>brought<s%> him, and he shall make his <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous.<s%>

<S%H7126>Come<s%> you <S%H7126>near<s%> to me, <S%H8085>hear<s%> you <S%H2063>this;<s%> I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning;<s%> from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that it was, <S%H8033>there<s%> am I: and <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> and his <S%H7307>Spirit,<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H3925>teaches<s%> you to <S%H3276>profit,<s%> which <S%H1869>leads<s%> you by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

O that you had <S%H7181>listened<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments!<s%> then had your <S%H7965>peace<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> as a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> as the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%>

Your <S%H2233>seed<s%> also had <S%H1961>been<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand,<s%> and the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> of your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> like the <S%H4579>gravel<s%> thereof; his <S%H8034>name<s%> should not have been <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> me.

<S%H3318>Go<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> you from the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>singing<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> you, <S%H8085>tell<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H3318>utter<s%> it even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> you, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

And they <S%H6770>thirsted<s%> not when he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H2723>deserts:<s%> he caused the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for them: he <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> also, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2100>gushed<s%> out.
There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
